The movie follows Avi (Rajkummar Rao), who goes to Shimla for a holiday and falls in love with Naina (Rakul Preet Singh), who runs a cafe there. He decides to stay and work in her cafe and confesses his love in a letter. However, the letter is mistakenly read by Naina's mother Rukmini (Hema Malini), who is deaf and mute. Rukmini also develops feelings for Avi and decides to pursue him.
 
The movie is a light-hearted comedy that explores the awkward situations and misunderstandings that arise from this unusual scenario.
